feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Order RSS feed by upload date by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/241
  • [Enhancement] Adds in-app diagnostics page by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/243
  • [Housekeeping] Improved logging for all executable calls by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/244
  • [Enhancement] Support yt-dlp caching by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/245

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.5.14...v2024.5.15

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Fix yt-dlp illegal write issue that causes failure to fetch source details by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/247
  • [Typo] Fix spelling on app info page by @drewstopherlee in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/248

New Contributors

  • @drewstopherlee made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.5.15...v2024.5.16

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Show currently executing jobs on homepage by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/250
  • [Enhancement] Add media count to sources page by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/251
  • [Enhancement] Add support for 8k downloads by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/254
  • [Enhancement] Allow setting preference for video/audio codec by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/255
  • [Dev] Add ERD for tracking database state by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/256

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.5.16...v2024.5.22

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Added "other" tab to see media that's not set for download by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/258
  • [Enhancement] Added search to source forms by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/259

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.5.22...v2024.5.24

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Added upload date to source tables by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/260
  • [Enhancement] Added library size to homepage by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/264
  • [Enhancement] Added link to local stream on media item show page by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/265
  • [Housekeeping] Store the upload event as a datetime rather than a date by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/269
  • [Enhancement] Improve handling of large media collections by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/272
  • [Bugfix] Resolve server error for media items without a description by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/274
  • [Enhancement] Added support for subdirectory-style reverse proxies by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.5.24...v2024.5.30
